text.text: Media: Nintendo game card, ROM cartridge

text.name: info9
text.text: The Nintendo DS, or simply DS, is a dual-screen handheld game console.

text.name: info10
text.text: The DS introduced distinctive new features to handheld gaming: two LCD

text.name: info11
text.text: screens working in tandem, a built-in microphone, and support for wireless.
